content: in this legal case the district court in ljubljana made a decision on august 17 2021 the court fee was 810 eur and the heir is responsible for paying half of it the procedure started on january 13 2021 and lasted for 7 months and 4 days the final resolution involves dividing assets worth 186000 eur including real estate properties funds in a personal account and unpaid pension benefits the son and daughter are the legitimate heirs and they will each receive half of the assets the court based its decision on the inheritance act and the civil procedure act the court received the death certificate of the deceased person who was a citizen of slovenia the court initiated succession proceedings and declared the son as the legal heir to half of the estate the estate will be distributed based on the information provided in the death certificate and land registry the net value of the estate is 168000 eur and the court fee of 810 eur will be split between the heirs the legal text also explains the process of lodging an appeal which must be done within 15 days of receiving the written decision the appeal must be lodged with the court and include the necessary copies for all parties involved the appeal will be decided by the ljubljana high court and must clearly state the order being appealed and the grounds for the appeal the appeal must be sent by registered post on the last day of the appeal period

metadata.subject_of_succession: real estate, funds on personal account, unpaid pension benefits and insurance policy
